data.client_settings: Stable 22333 - EdgeHTML 17.17134 - Firefox Quantum v61.0.2 - Google Chrome Stable 68.0.3440.106 (64-bit)
data.actual_result: You can drag and make it appear as if you're selecting two different options
data.expected_result: There should not be a visual effect as there is none on the desktop version
data.short_description: [Web ONLY] You can drag across multiple options to make it appear as if you're selecting multiple options in the vertical kebab menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Click the vertical kebab menu to the right of the message - Click and hold on one option - Drag your mouse over an option while still having the first option selected (held down) - Attempt the same on desktop
